title: How to write an acrostic poem with the word 'water' - Quora

response.answer_text: Acrostic poem is written in a manner to convey a message through first letter of each line. For example if we have to convey WATER then it could be like Water is my favourite drink,At times the best thing to quench a thirstThat comes to me suddenly,Even though it's abundantly availableRefined, pure specimens are sold in shops Or Waterdrops fall on the tin roofAnd sound like cars on a dirt drivewayThe sound from the water makes me fall asleepEveryone thinks it is nice to listen toRainbows should come out now, since the rain has stopped Use Imagination and creativity to describe the subject or even tell a brief story about it.
